description: The original Stretch Zion Pant is back! Stretch, durability, abrasion resistance… Sounds like you've just found the ultimate climbing pant. Great for hitting the crag or just outdoor exploring, this pant is as tough as it is practical. Built-in sun protection and water repellency mean you can really rely on this pant whatever the weather.
name: Prana Stretch Zion Pants, 28" Inseam - Mens
